jobHistory.title: CFO / Software Developer
jobHistory.description: I managed both projects and finances within the company. On the project side, I took on development for a wide array of projects, including full-stack and mobile development. For finances, I managed all financing, including bookkeeping, tax preparation, and payroll.

jobHistory.title: Software Developer
jobHistory.description: I worked directly with clients on an array of different project types. I created mobile, web, and desktop applications with a multitude of different frameworks and technologies.

jobHistory.title: Web Developer
jobHistory.description: I began this position with a task of rewriting the current company website to be fully responsive, allowing them to have a single site, rather than a separate mobile site. After that project was finished, I moved over to short-term support, handling bug fixes and any user-reported errors.

jobHistory.title: Master Barber
jobHistory.description: After graduating barber school, I began working to provide barbering services, including haircuts and straight razor shaves. In 2020, I ventured into opening my own barber shop, and have successfully built it up to provide careers for several industry professionals.
